title: Elegant Diamond Floral Pendant - Traditional Charm, Modern Sparkle
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Brilliant-Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color). Features exceptional craftsmanship with a Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A gracefully curved floral pendant design, set with meticulously placed brilliant-cut diamonds. The openwork design allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the sparkle. Modern interpretation of traditional floral motifs, seamlessly blending heritage with contemporary aesthetics.
colors: Rose gold and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and as a thoughtful gift. Can be paired with a delicate gold chain for a sophisticated look.
description: Timeless design crafted with precision and exceptional materials. The sparkling diamonds and rose gold create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. This pendant offers a modern twist on traditional floral designs, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Excellent value for a high-quality diamond pendant.
